message: I think this is a fair split, Bob.  You get a good chunk of the money, and I get the majority.  Let's get this over with!
I'm willing to compromise, but I think I deserve more. You can't get away with taking most of the money!
Bob, let's be reasonable.  We're both losing money with every round. A 50/50 split is the fairest option at this point.
I'm still not satisfied with the split. I think I deserve a slightly larger share, considering my negotiating skills are being wasted on this.
